verses.text: \w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* numbers \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* enemyâ€™s \w army|strong="H5971"\w* \w greater|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* thine, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* hand, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w stand|strong="H5066"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* this manner:

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* join \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* dismayed, \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w back|strong="H0413"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w deliver|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* danger.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* captains \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* proclaim \w through|strong="H0413"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* band \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hearing \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w*: \w What|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w dedicated|strong="H2596"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*? \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w dedicate|strong="H2596"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w What|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* common, whereof \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* eat? \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w execute|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* office.

\w What|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath espoused \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*? \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0413"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w declared|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w What|strong="H4310"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* fearful, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w faint|strong="H4549"\w* hearted? \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, lest \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w*, \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w himself|strong="H3824"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* possessed \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w shall|strong="H6485"\w* hold \w their|strong="H1961"\w* peace, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, \w every|strong="H7218"\w* \w man|strong="H7218"\w* \w shall|strong="H6485"\w* prepare \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w bands|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* fight.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* time thou \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, thou shalt first \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gates \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* therein, shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* saved, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee paying \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* peace, \w and|strong="H4421"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* begin \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee, thou shalt besiege \w it|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* thy bands, thou shalt \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* therein \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* male sex, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*,

Excepting \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w divide|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prey|strong="H0962"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* army, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt receive \w in|strong="H3808"\w* possession.

\w But|strong="H7535"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w those|strong="H0428"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee, thou shalt suffer \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* shalt kill \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* edge \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sword, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wit, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Hethite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Amorrhite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Chanaanite, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Pherezite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Hevite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee:

Lest \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w besieged|strong="H4692"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* hath compassed \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* bulwarks \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0120"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou spoil \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* round \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* axes: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* increase \w the|strong="H0853"\w* number \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* fruitful, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* wild, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* fit \w for|strong="H3588"\w* other uses, \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* engines, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* thou \w take|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* fighteth \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee.
